abstract: Sen Harry Reid of Nevada returns to his home in Washington after surgery for injuries sustained in exercise accident.
lead_paragraph: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada was back at his home in Washington on Monday after surgery for injuries sustained in an exercise accident on Jan. 1.
snippet: Senator Harry Reid of Nevada was back at his home in Washington on Monday after surgery for injuries sustained in an exercise accident on Jan. 1.

headline.main: Reid Is Home After Surgery for Injuries
headline.print_headline: Reid Is Home After Surgery For Injuries
